title: Herbal Immune Gummies — Amla + Ginger
excerpt: Chewable immune support gummies combining amla (natural vitamin C) and ginger for digestive and immune support—ideal for adults and teens.
content:
## What Are These Immune Gummies?
Tasty, pectin-based gummies formulated with concentrated amla extract and ginger to provide daily immune and digestive support in a palatable form for adults and teens.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Amla is a classical rasayana for immunity and digestion; ginger supports digestive fire and aids nutrient assimilation—together they form a balanced daily tonic.

### Key Benefits
- Vitamin C and antioxidant support from amla.
- Digestive and carminative support from ginger.
- Convenient chewable format for busy lifestyles.

## Ingredients
- Amla extract
- Ginger extract
- Fruit pectin (vegetarian gelling agent)
- Natural sweeteners (jaggery alternatives or limited sugar)

## Usage Instructions
- Take **1–2 gummies daily** or as directed on the label.

## Packaging
- Airtight child-resistant jar with clear dosing instructions.

## Safety & Consultation
- Consult your healthcare provider if pregnant, breastfeeding, or on medication. Keep out of reach of small children and follow dosing instructions.

## Why Choose These Gummies?
A convenient, tasty way to add gentle Ayurvedic immune support to daily routines without syrups or capsules.
